kpi_info.title: M3UA_ASSO_SET_UNAVAILABLE_TIME
kpi_info.use: Association set unavailability in seconds. This calculates cumulative duration of unavailability of the association set. UPDATED:The period of unavailable time begins when the association set becomes unavailable. This means that none of the associations of the association set are in ASP-ACTIVE state. Updating of the counter ends when the state of the association set becomes available. The association set is available if even one association of the association set is in ASP-ACTIVE state.
